name: The Milu
description:
A game made for LD37.

It is a text-based game, but I'd rather call it short game stories.

The girl and her daddy use a telescope trying to find the milu, but the things they talk about seems to more important.

If Story A is too long and meaningless for you, Story B is more colorful thanks to Humble Ray - that is why I used nearly all animation resource and9 done for me in it.

Thanks to Lieve Oma and Three Fourths Home for inspiration.

Control:

Put Mouse around the telescope to move it.

And click to continue the dialogue.

Bug Warning:

The pictures in the telescope don't work well now.

Where is the room?

It's... in the loading scene?
